File name should not be longer than 31 characters, otherwise style linking does not work in MS Word/Mac.

file name length is '26': 'TradeGothicNext-HvCnIt.ttf'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Italic (TradeGothicNext-HvCnIt.ttf)

-/-

File Name

File name should not be longer than 31 characters, contain space and have more then one dot for ending.

Everything is fine: 'TradeGothicNext-HvCnIt.ttf'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

OS/2, usWeightClass

MS NID 2

usWeightClass should be 700 if MS ID 2 is 'Bold'.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'
usWeightClass is '700'.
Everything is good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name, Bold Italic

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'

head.macStyle.bold is 'True'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'

Advance width of 'FOUR-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2005) should be 1/4 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2005 in this font.

Advance width of 'SIX-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2006) should be 1/6 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2006 in this font.

Info

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

'Yacute' (uni00DD) (ID 61)

table version 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

OS/2

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Italic

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True the OS/2 panose array form flag should be an 'Oblique' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is an 'Oblique' entry.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OS/2

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

variable font

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

STAT

static font

More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Italic (TradeGothicNext-HvCnIt.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+0000

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'TradeGothicNext-Light'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

name

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

name

Error

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next Light'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Demi, Sm, Ultra, Ex, Dm, Semi, X, Xtra'

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'TradeGothicNext-Light'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Error

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Regular (TradeGothicNext-Lt.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next Light'.

Pass

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '27'
'TradeGothicNext-LightItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Light Italic (TradeGothicNext-LtIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

MS is: 'Copyright © 2008-2015 Monotype GmbH. All rights reserved.'

Pass

MS is: 'Trade Gothic Next Light'

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Linotype Design Studio'
MS is: 'Linotype Design Studio'

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com'
MS is: 'This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'TradeGothicNext-Cond'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

name

Error

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond' (NID 1).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

If NID 2 is 'Regular': MS NID 4 = NID 1

NID 4 'Trade Gothic Next Cond' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next Cond'

Pass

name

MS NID 4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Demi, Sm, Ultra, Ex, Dm, Semi, X, Xtra'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Trade Gothic Next Cond'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 3.03' does match fontRevision 'Version 3.03'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'TradeGothicNext-Cond'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

name

Error

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Regular (TradeGothicNext-Cn.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond' (NID 1).

Pass

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Demi, Sm, Ultra, Ex, Dm, Semi, X, Xtra'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 3.03' does match fontRevision 'Version 3.03'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '26'
'TradeGothicNext-CondItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

name

12 NID Mac

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed Italic' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Trade Gothic Next'

name

MS NID 0

Wrong second year in copyright. It is '2015', but should be the current year '2020'.

Pass

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Trade Gothic Next'
MS is: 'Trade Gothic Next'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Italic (TradeGothicNext-CnIt.ttf)

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Condensed Italic'
MS is: 'Condensed Italic'

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'TradeGothicNext'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

11 NID Mac

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 11 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

If NID 2 and 17 = 'Regular': Mac NID 16 should match NID 1.
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). This is true for MS Office Version 1639 and lower. Even though Microsoft has changed it with version 1640 (fast insider, June 2020) we keep this as an error, because most of the current MS Office users won't update in the near future. More infos here:
Cross Platform Issues

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Warning

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

name

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Regular (TradeGothicNext-Rg.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If NID 2 and 17 = 'Regular': MS NID 16 should match NID 1.
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). This is true for MS Office Version 1639 and lower. Even though Microsoft has changed it with version 1640 (fast insider, June 2020) we keep this as an error, because most of the current MS Office users won't update in the near future. More infos here:
Cross Platform Issues

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Warning

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Pass

name

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 11 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Italic' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 16

Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Trade Gothic Next'

Pass

'Italic'

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

MS NID 0

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Wrong second year in copyright. It is '2015', but should be the current year '2020'.

Pass

'Trade Gothic Next'

Trade Gothic Next Italic (TradeGothicNext-It.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Trade Gothic Next Italic' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

MS is: 'Copyright © 2008-2015 Monotype GmbH. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'TradeGothicNext-CondBold'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'CondBold'

name

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed Bold' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed Bold' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold (TradeGothicNext-BdCn.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Trade Gothic Next'

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '30' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'CondBoldItalic'

Warning

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed Bold Italic' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '30' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdCnIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

Mac NID 6

NID 6 length is '20'
'TradeGothicNext-Bold'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

name

12 NID MS

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold (TradeGothicNext-Bd.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '26'
'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Trade Gothic Next' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '26'
'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic'

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Bold Italic (TradeGothicNext-BdIt.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Test Trademark

'Trade Gothic is a trademark of Monotype GmbH registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondHv', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'TradeGothicNext-CondHv', Everything looks good.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Critical

Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv Regular (TradeGothicNext-HvCn.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Trade Gothic Next Condensed Heavy' ≠ 'Trade Gothic Next Cond Hv' (NID 1).

Pass
